Игра хорошая

Comment ne pas recommander un jeu où on veut te tuer durant toute la partie ?

Plus sérieusement, ce jeu est une aventure à lui tout seul. Le but ? Résoudre des puzzles pendant qu'on se fout de ta gueule parce que t'arrives pas à les résoudre. :>
L'histoire est intéressante, pas non plus exceptionnelle (me frappez pas) mais on se prend très facilement au jeu de GlaDos et Wheatley. 
Bon, j'avoue, j'ai commencé Portal 2 avant le premier Portal (bouuuuh), mais de mon expérience, je n'ai pas été trop perdue dans l'histoire, donc n'ai pas peur de prendre le 2 avant le 1. Surtout si tu t'en fous de l'histoire et que tu veux juste résoudre des puzzles (traître è.é). D'ailleurs les puzzles se complexifient avec les chapitres, mais t'inquiète, on te donnera tout ce dont tu as besoin pour les résoudre ! Mais on se foutera toujours de ta gueule parce que ça deviendra de plus en plus dur. :>>

Côtés graphisme et musique, c'est plutôt propre, rien à redire, pas de bugs apparents, enfin pour moi, la musique est bien adaptée, pas trop stressante, mais tu retiendras probablement plus la musique de fin, qui est... Ofkfjeuxiskbdjfofosnwnsusodnnd. Voilà. D'ailleurs, prépare les mouchoirs si tu es sensible, je n'en dirais pas plus.

Grossomodo, ce jeu est propre, bien développé, ça donne vraiment envie de continuer encore et encore, c'est pour ça qu'il existe des salles tests de communauté, qui rallongent la durée de vie du jeu, tu peux même t'éclater à en faire, n'hésite pas !
Bref, je le recommande chaudement. :3

PS : The cake is a lie.
<3

Portal 2 - игра, которая рушит законы физики и ваши представления об играх. Довелось мне сыграть сию чудесную игру в январе, после бурного празднования Нового Года, соответственно, море еды и никакого желания высовывать нос на улицу в минус 30. Играть мне пришлось в кооперативе с незнакомым молодым человеком, который тоже еле понимал, что происходит. И так, два человека, дико не выспавшиеся, после дозы алкоголя играют в головоломку. На некоторые уровни уйти могло и по часу тщетных попыток разгадки. Когда сил уже не было смеяться, а мозг стал считать, что его владелиц больной убл*док с наклонностями садомазохизма, который не дает ему проспаться и заставляет напрягать последние не уснувшие извилины, снисходило озарение, в основном от молодого человека, который эту игру однажды играл, и с диким восторгом проходили уровень, чтобы потом опять начинать сомневаться в своих умственных способностях уже в уровнях повыше. Игра действительно интересная, как и одиночная, так и ко-оп, на деле не такая сложная, как показалась при первой попытке поиграть, но жутко увлекательная, Глэдос испускают шутки, которые могут ранить, но ей простить можно, все же она ИИ. Не о чем не жалею, это были уморительные часы, проведенные в компьютерных играх, поэтому советую игру купить для новогодних праздников, себе и другу. Всех с Наступающим! P.S С тем вторым чокнутым до сих пор общаемся.

Hands down one of my favorite games of all time!! if you've never played this do yourself a favor and play it ASAP. The game is really easy to get into even if you havent played the original game however i recomend playing the original portal aswell, there are alot of great references to content from the original.

Despite not being a survival game, this reminded me strongly of having a survival element to it. The dialogue was wonderfully written and hilarious as I've come to expect with the Portal games. The first thing I noticed was how much better the graphics and gameplay was than the first Portal; walking seemed much faster, and the introduction of shading and higher details made this game one of the best-looking I've played all year.

I liked the addition of multiplayer to the Portal series, which I felt was something the first Portal was severely missing.

I would recommend this game to anybody asking for game recommendations without hesitation, this is easily one of my favorite games of 2016.

Introduction 

Portal 2 is a puzzle game that heavily relies on this vital organ called the "Brain" not watching walkthroughs in youtube. This game has a great way of making puzzles yet having a good story behind it! This game also has co-op which can be rage inducing if you play with stranges but when it comes to playing with friends, oh that's just pure fun or either just trying to kill each other.


Story : 100/100 ( Spoiler Free!)

The story of this game is fantastic! and of course you will be needing to play the first Portal in order to understand the story of this game. This game's story is just amazing and entertaining there are no parts that are boring, at least for me. The story isn't vague and cryptic most of the time it's a right at your face as you progress-story.


Graphics : 87/100

This game's graphics aren't very demanding in terms of power but at the same time looking beautiful for dem screenshots! There's not much to talk about graphics in this game but in general it looks pretty but it doesn't require a buffed up PC


Gameplay : 1000/100

The game's gameplay mechanics or just gameplay in general is amazing! It is a very special snowflake when you mention FPS this game is technically FPS I guess since FPS is a first person SHOOTER and in this game you SHOOT portals yes? Back to the topic, this game's gameplay is just super fun as you can screw around by making your own map in a laughable manner or just making a map to impress others. *scoffs* show-off.


Replay Value : 97/100

The replay value of this game is completely depending on the person playing, but who could not find replay value with a fun story  & some silly co-op? Well if you're getting tired of the default maps / levels of those 2 luckily this game supports  the steam workshop, so we technically have infinite playtime due to the creativity level of the commmunity.



Overall : 90/100
Buena trama, buen modo de juego, desafiante y muy ilarante, totalmente recomendado como puzzle o como juego de plataforma

剧情好赞，慢慢探索真相的过程真的很棒！难度适中就是有的地方十分考验眼力。。。
如果你很喜欢1的话那2一定不会让你失望，以及与1一样满分的ED！

I didn't think Portal could get any better. I was wrong.

Portal 2 just blew me away. The puzzles were cerebral and fun and the comedy was on point as usual,  adding Steven Merchant as the voice of Wheatley was a stroke of genius. His dry British wit was something I didn't know I wanted. And GLaDOS is such a star in this game as she was in the original Portal.

Easily one of my Top 10 favourite games of all time. Can they top this in Portal 3? lets hope so!
This game made me wanna have sexual intercourse with a bloodthirsty sarcastic robot science lady. 10/10

O Portal 1 e 2 , estou enviando a mesma analise, porque um complementa o outro, o Portal 2 é cheio de conteúdo novo e dinâmico, mas fica incompleto sem o Portal 1.

Ainda melhor que o primeiro, e diferente do portal 1, esse aqui tem os leveis da comunidade, oque aumenta em 700% o tempo de jogo, a história agora se aprofunda mais, no primeiro jogo você apenas joga e ouve as ordens da GLaDOS e lá pro final a história se desenvolve de repente me pegando muito de surpresa, ainda mais porque eu nunca tinha lido sobre o jogo antes pa evitar spoilers, ja aqui a historia é dividida em capítulos e os planos pra escapar ja começam antes da metade do jogo, com personagens super legais, eu pessoalmente não gostei muito da seção da aperture antiga, mas achei ela bem desafiadora de qualquer forma, juntamente com todos os itens da valve você consegue um desconto de 90% na promoção o que te dá um preço super baixo pra horas e horas de gameplay, recomendo muito

update:Had to change to windowed mode (Thanks to SuperGenaricName)

No other company can make a game quite like Valve. The characters, the environments, the voice-acting, the perfect balance between fun and challenging gameplay, the puzzles, the action, the sense of awe, dread, sadness and the humor. Half-Life may be the greatest series of all time, but it lacks the things that makes Portal stand out. In Half-Life, you choose to fight, you don't know for what, or what the future holds for you. But in Portal, you must fight. Fight for answers, for freedom, for the chance of gaining your life back, for the sake of making sure your future is what you choose it to be. 
 
If you're at all familiar with Valve's way of storytelling, then it should come to no surprise that Portal, both the original and the sequel, excel at everything stated above. Any true fan of Valve will know that their games will never dissapoint.
